cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,1,749083919,Weather Live° - Local Forecast,Mosaic S.r.l.,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/weather-live-local-forecast/id749083919?uo=4,0.0,4.43356,143,Weather,"With Weather Live°, planning your day-to-day activities is easier than ever before: simply choose the weather parameters you want to track, which layout you prefer, and view your customized weather forecast! Feast your eyes on the breathtaking weather backgrounds that make the forecast as visual as nature itself.
WEATHER AT A GLANCE
- Accurate forecasts for today and the week ahead with local times for multiple locations, worldwide
- Animated weather scenes reflecting weather conditions
- Bad weather warnings and alerts to give you a heads up about severe weather in your area
- Adjustable weather layouts — choose which weather parameters you’d like to see first
- Daily weather reports with important information.
INSIGHTFUL DETAILS
- Today's Min, Max and ""Feels Like"" temperature
- Pressure in inches, mm, kPa or mbar
- Precipitation and humidity info
- Wind speed and direction
- Sunrise/Sunset and Moonrise/Moonset time
- Golden hour and Blue hour
- UV and Visibility details
- Dew Point info
- Wind Chill
- Fahrenheit/Celsius and Miles/Kilometers
- 12 or 24-hour time format.
SIMPLICITY OF USE
- Useful weather widget: get the detailed temperature forecast and severe weather alerts right on your Home Screen.
- Handy Apple Watch app: view the current weather conditions and the forecast for the coming hours right on your watch face.
Get Weather Live° and be prepared for any weather!
Please note that some supplementary features in the basic (free) version are subject to limitations (ex. UV index, Sun and Moon, Visibility, etc.). These limitations are also subject to change.
Get Weather Live° Premium:
- 14-day hourly forecast
- Interactive weather maps
- Hurricane Tracker
- Lightning Tracker
- Lock & Home Screen widgets
- Min-by-min precipitation chart as a Live Activity
- Air Quality
- RainScope
- Ability to rearrange the blocks with weather details
- Ad-free experience.

Subscription payments will be charged to your App Store account at confirmation of your purchase.  Subscriptions will automatically renew and you will be charged unless auto-renew is turned off or unless you cancel at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription or trial period.  Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a premium subscription during the free trial period. The cost of renewal depends on the Subscription Plan you choose.
Subscriptions and auto-renewal may be managed by going to Account Settings after purchase or by contacting Customer Support.
IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES AND CONSENT

If you live in the European Union and wish to cancel your order, you may do so within 14 days. You can do this by following the process laid out in the Apple App Store. Please note and acknowledge: you cannot cancel your order or obtain a refund if you have downloaded the app and started using it (i.e. for example, by opening and using the App).
Privacy Policy: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4",2013-11-26T01:50:35Z,2025-11-12T09:52:08Z
cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,2,1161387262,Windy.com,"Windyty, SE",https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/windy-com/id1161387262?uo=4,0.0,4.67924,53,Weather,"A UNIQUE WEATHER FORECAST VISUALISATION

While most weather forecasting apps rely only on free global models, Windy has gone a few steps further and invested heavily in the most accurate models available, always at the highest possible resolution, to ensure accurate weather forecasts.
WEATHER RADAR & SATELLITE IMAGERY

A weather radar is the most requested tool for weather forecasting. To provide the most accurate radar imagery, we constantly expand our resources so that rain, snow, and storms don't catch you by surprise. Trusted sources include NOAA, Met Office, AROME, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and others.
MORE THAN 50 WEATHER MAPS AND TOOLS
- Wind forecast (current speed, gusts, accumulation, models comparison, data from weather stations)
- Temperature, humidity, pressure, dew point, freezing altitude
- Rain, thunder, storms, precipitation type, CAPE-index
- Weather radar and Satellite images (blue, infrared, visible)
- Clouds, clouds tops, clouds base and visibility (LIFR, IFR, MVFR, VFR), fog
- Waves, swell, currents
- Solar activity maps (solar power, UV index, wet-bulb temperature)
- Snow depth, new snow, snow density
- NO2, PM 2.5, Aerosol, SO2, Ozone layer, Surface ozone, CO concentration, Dust mass
- Weather warnings & Extreme forecast
- Soil moisture, Moisture anomaly, Drought intensity, Fire Danger, Fuel Moisture
Available global weather models and resolution:
- ECMWF
- GFS by NOAA
- ICON by DWD
Available local weather models
- HRRR by NOAA
- NAM by NOAA
- HRDPS by MSC
- ICON-EU by DWD
- ICON-D2 by DWD
- UKV by British Met Office
- AROME-HD by Météo France
- ALADIN by CHMI
- NEMS by meteoblue
- MSM by JMA
- ACCESS-C by Australian BoM
CUSTOM WEATHER ALERTS
- Want to know about essential weather forecasts before everyone else? Set up a custom alert based on the weather in your favorite location. Whether it's wind strength, precipitation, or temperature.
HURRICANE TRACKING, STORM TRACKING

With Windy's hurricane tracking tool, you can track a hurricane's past and projected path. Windy doesn't rely on just one hurricane model but will give you all the forecasts available for a storm or hurricane.
WEATHER WIDGETS for iOS, iPadOS, MacOS

Windy serves up a quick weather overview on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, as well as live radar by NOAA, Met Office, Meteo France, DWD, JMA, ACCESS, and many other trusted sources. You can choose from several view sizes and types. 3-5 day forecast, live weather radar, live satellite, or a simple lock screen overview.
TOOLS MADE FOR PILOTS
- 16 altitude levels from the surface to 13.5km/FL450
- 50k+ Airports searchable by ICAO and IATA, including runway info, decoded & raw METARs, TAFs and NOTAMs
- Detailed Airgram and Meteogram
- Thermals forecast
- Meteogram: temperature and dew point, wind speed and wind gusts, pressure, precipitation, altitude cloud cover
- Route planner
WINDY FOR APPLE WATCH
Forecast, radar, METARs, and wind information in a small, lovely package.
Use the Apple Watch face by Windy.com to have it all on your screen anytime.
Terms of Use: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-terms-of-use
Privacy Policy: https://account.windy.com/agreements/windy-privacy-policy
GET IN TOUCH with Windy
Join us at community.windy.com to discuss weather-related topics, report bugs, or suggest a new feature. Or contact us at info@windy.com on any topic.
FOLLOW Windy ON SOCIAL MEDIA
- Facebook: facebook.com/windyforecast
- X: X.com/windycom
- Threads: https://www.threads.net/@windy_forecast
- Instagram: instagram.com/windy_forecast
- YouTube: youtube.com/@Windyforecast",2016-10-31T20:29:54Z,2025-11-03T08:13:21Z

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,3,749133753,Clime: Weather Radar Live,Mosaic S.r.l.,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/clime-weather-radar-live/id749133753?uo=4,0.0,4.3883,188,Weather,"Real-time radar images, severe weather alerts, accurate weather forecasts and much more - precise & timely to help keep you safe!

- Precipitation map provides precipitation forecast for the next 24 hours
- Satellite map illustrates the cloud cover
- Choose background maps (standard, hybrid, satellite), search locations, add them to bookmarks and stay out of harm’s way.
KEEP YOURSELF SAFE:
- Read weather alerts with all the details you might need
- Receive push notifications whenever there’s a weather alert for the bookmarked location.
VIEW WEATHER DETAILS:
- 24-hour and 7-day forecast
- Current, today’s min & max and ""Feels Like"" temperature
- Pressure, humidity, wind speed, visibility, dew point info
- Chance of Precipitation
- Sunrise & sunset time.
Coverage Info:

Radar images: the US (Continental US, Alaska (except northern), Hawaii, Northern Mariana Islands and Puerto Rico), Mexico (northern), Canada (southern), Australia, the UK, Ireland, Germany, France, the Netherlands, Italy (northern and north-western), Denmark, Austria, Sweden, Finland, Spain, Portugal, Switzerland, Norway, Poland, Andorra, Japan and more. See the full list on the developer’s website.
Precipitation, temperature, satellite maps
column5: detailed weather info, precipitation alerts: most of the world.

column1: Governmental severe weather warnings: Australia, Austria, Belgium, Canada, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Latvia, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, UK.

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,5,295646461,Weather - The Weather Channel,The Weather Channel,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/weather-the-weather-channel/id295646461?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"The Weather Channel is the World's Most Accurate Forecaster*. With extreme weather on the rise, prepare yourself for storms, hurricanes & wildfires. Track daily forecasts and receive live radar updates, storm alerts, & local precipitation updates.

Our live Doppler radar maps, storm watch, and hurricane tracker can warn you ahead of time of severe storms, heavy rain, heat waves, or an incoming flood. Receive your forecast updates and rest assured with our weather warnings. Severe weather is increasing - our severe weather alerts have you covered.

Plan up to 15 days in advance with forecasts from the World’s Most Accurate Weather Forecaster, so you can plan ahead with confidence*. Manage personal weather alerts, so you receive notifications that are important to you.
Download The Weather Channel to get you through storm season, hurricane season & extreme weather warnings.
The Weather Channel Features:
Today’s Weather Forecast:
- 15-minute forecast for rain intensity up to 7 hours in the future & radar on your homescreen
- Check weather forecasts up to two weeks in advance!
- Prepare for severe storms & hurricane season
- Monitor breathing conditions with our Air Quality Index forecast
Widget & Homescreen Features:
- Our smart widget offers more weather in detail at a glance and one-tap access to the forecast
- Check your local radar, get severe weather alerts in your area, and check the forecast for the next three hours on your homescreen
Additional Features:
- Detailed information on sunset times
- Stay prepared during extreme weather events, hurricanes, and earthquakes with live breaking news alerts
Upgrade to The Weather Channel Premium for our most comprehensive, dynamic, and precise weather experience available. Exclusive access to:
- Ad-free weather
- 15-minute forecast details
- Advanced 72-Hour Future Radar
- and more!

You can cancel The Weather Channel subscription anytime through your App Store account settings, or it will automatically renew. Privacy & Feedback

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,6,997079492,Windy.app - Wind & Weather,Windy Weather World Inc,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/windy-app-wind-weather/id997079492?uo=4,0.0,4.375,16,Weather,"Windy.app - wind, waves and weather forecast app for surfers, kitesurfers, windsurfers, sailors, fishermen and other wind sports.
FEATURES:
•  Wind report, forecast and statistics: wind map, accurate wind compass, wind meter, wind gusts and wind directions. It’s very useful for extreme wind sports.
•  Wind alert: Set up windalert and be aware of wind, storm and tornado warning via push-notifications
•  Weather history (archive) for 2012-2024: view wind data, temperature (day and night) and atmospheric pressure. Weather archive will help you to choose the best month for travel to the spot.

•  Local forecast from NOAA: temperature in Celsius, Fahrenheit and Kelvin, humidity, wind speed, precipitation (rain and snow). Forecast for 10 days with 3 hours step in metric or imperial units: m/s (mps), mph, km/h, knt (knout), bft (beaufort), m, ft, mm, cm, in, hPa, inHg. NOAA is a National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration / National Weather Service (nws).
•  Wave forecast: ocean or sea conditions, ocean waves and sea swell, fishing forecast
•  Animated wind tracker: weather radar for sailing, yachting and kiting in light wind
•  Cloud base/Dewpoint (dew point) data: necessary weather information for pleasant paragliding
•  Spots: over 30.000 spots sorted and located by the type and area. Add your spots to favourites.
•  Spot chats. Got anemometer? Share info about weather conditions and wind direction in the chat from a kite spot.
•  Community: exchange weather reports on the spot. Want to be a local/spot leader? Email us the name of your spot at feedback@catchwind.co and we will create a chat for it.
•  Weather Stations: online data from nearby online weather stations.
•  Offline Mode: activate offline mode and check the forecast for your activities without internet connection.
PERFECT FOR:
• Kitesurfing (kitesurf)
• Windsurfing (wind surf)
• Surfing
• Sailing (Boating)
• Yachting
• Paragliding
• Fishing
• Snowkiting
• Snowboarding
• Skiing
• Skydiving
• Kayaking (kayak)
• Wakeboarding
• Cycling
• Hunting (hunt)
• Golf
The free version allows you to use basic app functions.
WINDY PRO Account auto-renewable subscription allows using all functions of this app. Subscription length periods: 1 month with 3 days free trial, and 1 year with 7 days free trial.

Payment for WINDY PRO Account subscriptions will be charged to your iTunes account at the time of purchase. Your subscription will be automatically renewed every 30 or 365 days. If you have never subscribed to a monthly Premium account subscription before, you will have the option of getting a free 3/7-day trial period. Cancelling the trial period will immediately disable your subscription.

Payment for subscription renewals will be charged to your account within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can disable subscription renewal in your iTunes account settings on your device.
Terms of Use:  https://windyapp.co/CustomMenuItems/34/en
Created by kite addicted for wind addicted! Be WINDY. Join us!
Waiting for your feedback and recommendations. Help us to make the best wind sports app!",2015-06-26T14:25:21Z,2025-11-19T08:26:52Z

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,8,300048137,AccuWeather Weather Forecast,"AccuWeather International, Inc.",https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/accuweather-weather-forecast/id300048137?uo=4,0.0,4.38462,13,Weather,"AccuWeather’s trusted free weather forecast app is at your fingertips
Internationally recognized by the World Meteorological Organization with awards making AccuWeather one of the best weather apps:
“Best User Interface and Data Representation”
“Best Weather Warnings”
“Best Design and Presentation of Information, User-Friendliness
Weather Forecasts You Can Depend On
-  Live weather forecasts - including MinuteCast® forecasts for Minute by Minute® precipitation updates

-  Advanced weather radar - gives you up to the minute views of storm tracking, snow, rain, ice, temperature changes, and much more

Live weather with Weather Alerts

With in-depth weather news, forecast updates, free weather alerts, plus today’s forecast and much more. Find out what makes AccuWeather the best as a trusted, free weather app. It’s the weather tracker you need!
Advanced Weather Radar
Setting the standard for free weather radar:
-  The accurate weather radar you know from AccuWeather

For over 10 years, the AccuWeather app has brought you the weather

This free weather app can show you snow, wind, cold, rain and more! Stay prepared with our local weather and live forecasts. From extreme humidity, severe storms, allergy info, air quality index, snow storms, and ice alerts, get live updates that matter to you. Local weather forecasts are the AccuWeather specialty.
Our weather tracker & live radar gives you Superior Accuracy™
Severe weather warnings, today’s temperature, free weather radar maps & more!
-  Get local forecasts and personalize the app depending on where you are in the world

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,9,628677149,Yahoo Weather,Yahoo Inc.,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/yahoo-weather/id628677149?uo=4,0.0,5,2,Weather,"Experience the weather | Apple Design Award Winner

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,11,336829635,Windfinder: Wind & Weather map,Windfinder.com,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/windfinder-wind-weather-map/id336829635?uo=4,0.0,4.64286,14,Weather,"Detailed wind and weather forecasts for your location.
See wind, waves, tides and weather reports and current wind measurements for your own weather predictions. Easy to use and free of charge.
FEATURES:
+ Detailed wind and weather forecasts for over 160,000 locations
+ Current wind and weather measurements in real-time from 21,000 weather stations
+ Tide forecasts with high and low tide based on 20,000 tide stations
+ Configure your favorites: save nearby spots and monitor the weather for your vacation
+ Animated wind map for a global wind overview
+ Small Wind Widgets (current conditions)
+ New: Severe weather warnings for Europe and the US
+ Measurements listed in knots, Beaufort, mph, km/h and m/s
+ Parameters: Wind speed, wind direction, gusts, air temperature, felt temperature, clouds coverage, precipitation, air pressure, wave height, wave period and wave direction
+ Webcams worldwide
+ Optimized display for optimal readability on the go and on any mobile device
+ Optimized data transfer for a quicker load speed
+ Topographic maps provide a quick overview of weather conditions and help with route planning
+ Easy to use interface - even with cold hands
PERFECT FOR:
• Kitesurfing & Windsurfing – find that next storm or windy days next door or at your next vacation
• Sailing – plan your next sailing trip and ensure safe passage by avoiding bad weather at sea
• Wing Foiling - Catch the best wind
• Surfing – find the perfect wave and high swell
• Dinghy sailing & regatta racers – prepare carefully for your next regatta
• SUP & Kayak – make sure high waves and wind don’t risk your adventures
• Paragliding – find a good wind right from the start
• Fishing – ensure a good catch with wind directions and tides
• Cycling, hiking & trekking – check if it will be windy on your route and take the right clothes and gear
• Boat owners & captains – keep an eye on the current wind conditions and tides
• ... anyone interested in reliable wind and weather predictions
WINDFINDER PLUS:
Subscribe to Windfinder Plus to get access to all features. With Windfinder Plus you also get:
+ Wind alerts: Specify your preferred wind conditions and get notified when windy or calm days are forecasted
+ Superforecast: our hourly high-resolution forecasting model for North America, Europe, South Africa, Egypt and the Canary Islands
+ Wind & Weather Widgets in all sizes with wind preview
+ Ad free: no distractions
+ Wind preview: get a quick visual overview of the next ten days
+ New: Value grid for weather parameters directly on the map
+ Animated wind speed maps with wind gusts, temperature, precipitation and topographic images
+ Wind report map: Real-time wind measurements from over 21,000 stations directly on the wind map
+ all webcams in the area
+ many more
Windfinder Plus is available as an In App Purchase.
Subscriptions:
Windfinder Plus: We offer auto-renewable ""Windfinder Plus"" subscriptions for one month or one year. The subscription unlocks the full feature set of Windfinder Plus.
Remove Ads: We offer auto-renewable ""Remove Ads"" subscriptions for 3 months, 6 months or one year. The app will be free of ads while the ""Remove Ads"" subscription is active.
Details:

A free trial period of 7 days is offered. Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. You will be charged for another period (1 month, 3 months, 6 months or one year) unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the subscription is renewed. You can turn off the auto-renewal in your account settings after purchase.

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,12,644482682,TEMPO E CLIMA,Casa Civil (Ceara),https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/tempo-e-clima/id644482682?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Todas as informações essenciais sobre o tempo e o clima do Brasil apresentada de forma clara, elegante e com suas informações provenientes do INMET - Instituto Nacional de Meteorologia do Brasil. Onde são feitas previsões para várias cidades e para as cinco regiões do Brasil. Apesar de esta versão estar completamente operacional, nosso time está trabalhando duro em melhorias. Este aplicativo e suas atualizações são de graça.
SEUS COMPONENTES:
Previsão – Para saber o que esperar para os próximos cinco dias nas cidades do Brasil.
Tempo Agora – Para que possa saber como está o tempo nas cidades do Brasil a partir de informações de temperatura, precipitação, umidade relativa e outras cinco variáveis atualizadas a cada hora.
Avisos – Mostra os avisos emitidos pelos meteorologistas da instituição para cada estado.
Satélite – Imagens da América do Sul do satélite GOES 13 animadas e atualizadas a cada quize minutos
EQUIPE DE DESENVOLVIMENTO:
A equipe de desenvolvimento é formada por cientistas da computação (BSc), meteorologistas (PhDs), engenheiros (PhDs).
NOTAS:
1. Está aplicação contém informações climáticas apenas para o Brasil e suas regiões, mas está disponível para usuários de outros países..
2. Este aplicativo faz uso de conexão a internet para acessar os dados diretamente da FUNCEME, por tanto é recomendo que o usuário tenha um plano de dados para evitar cobranças excessivas.
3. Para auxiliar os desenvolvedores comente qual dispositivo você utilizou a aplicação ou entre em contato por e-mail (apps@funceme.br).",2013-05-08T23:34:48Z,2020-11-23T13:29:11Z

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,13,545993260,Weather & Radar - Forecast,WetterOnline -  Meteorologische Dienstleistungen GmbH,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/weather-radar-forecast/id545993260?uo=4,0.0,4.5,8,Weather,"Precise forecasts and radars in Weather & Radar’s free app for the UK & Ireland:
- Hourly and daily weather forecast
- 14-day weather outlook
- Worldwide live weather map
- RainfallRadar
- TemperatureRadar & WindRadar
- Personalised notifications for your area
- Severe weather warnings & Warning Maps
- Weather Widget
- Snow & ski information
Weather App

Be up-to-date at all times with Weather & Radar’s free app! Always know whether the Sun will be out, a thunderstorm is approaching, if it’ll rain, hail or snow. The weather app will accurately display current weather conditions for your exact position and any further location worldwide.
Weather Forecast

Everything about the weather at a glance! The latest specifics on temperature, rain, probability of precipitation, snow, wind, sunshine hours, sunrise and sunset times. Detailed displays of air pressure, humidity levels and UV-Index. Plan further ahead with the 14-day weather outlook feature.
WeatherRadar

More than just your standard weather map! The enhanced radar map shows areas of cloud cover, sunshine, rainfall, snowfall, hail, fog, thunderstorms, and lightning strikes. See meteorological conditions for various locations at once. Trace the movement of cloud formations and active storms, to see, if they will hit or bypass your location. Switch to RainfallRadar and see rainfall only against a more subtle backdrop.
WindRadar & TemperatureRadar

Gone with the wind or not? Our latest feature, the WindRadar lets you track the wind, including wind direction and peak gusts. One click away you can find the TemperatureRadar, which allows you to see the temperature on a beautifully coloured map, up to 3 days ahead!
Personalised notifications

Stay ahead of the weather with personalised, local notifications. Get timely updates tailored to your exact location, helping you plan your day with confidence. From sudden downpours to sunny breaks, we keep you prepared - wherever you are!
Severe Weather Warnings & Warning Maps

Activate severe weather warnings and receive push notifications when extreme weather conditions such as winter storms, thunderstorms, lightning, high winds or snow are underway. The Warning Map lets you see where warnings have been issued - Europe-wide!
World Weather
Scheduling a trip or have a family member in another country? Save any location and see current conditions for any number of global locations at once. World weather at your fingertips!
Weather Widget
The widget displays weather information for your current location in a compact format on the home screen of your device.
Snow Info / Winter Sports
Planning a last-minute ski trip? Weather & Radar will tell you where the snow is! Access all ski and other winter sport info for major ski locations in Europe.
Use the weather app free of advertising with the in-app purchase and profit from the option to personalise your main page!

Weather & Radar Ad-free is a subscription service that will be renewed on either a monthly or a yearly basis. Payment for the subscription will be charged to the user’s Apple Account at confirmation of purchase. The subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. The user’s Apple account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Apple will identify the cost of the renewal. Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of the Weather & Radar Ad-free, free trial period will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription thereof.
Terms and Conditions: https://www.weatherandradar.co.uk/apps/ios/terms-of-use/
Should you have any queries or comments, kindly contact us at info@weatherandradar.co.uk",2012-08-01T09:29:02Z,2025-11-12T08:45:23Z

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,17,477048487,PredictWind — Marine Forecasts,PredictWind Limited,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/predictwind-marine-forecasts/id477048487?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Accurate marine weather forecasts and powerful tools utilizing wind, wave and currents, save you time, keep you safe and ensure you get the most out of every day on the water.

Access the world’s top-ranking forecast models for reliable and accurate wind and weather data, including ECMWF, AIFS, ICON, UKMO, GFS, and more. Our very own PWAi, PWG & PWE models deliver unmatched accuracy in the short-to-medium range.

In addition to marine forecasts, PredictWind also provides a suite of powerful marine weather tools to save you time and keep you safe at sea using Wind, Wave, Tidal and Ocean currents.

Weather Routing takes your start and end points then calculates your route factoring in tides, currents, wind and wave data, depth and your Sailing Yacht or Powerboats unique dimensions to give you the best route for comfort or speed.

Departure Planning quickly summarizes the forecast marine weather conditions you’ll encounter along your route if leaving on day 1, 2, 3, or 4. Use this data to select the perfect departure date, every time for your Sailing Yacht or Powerboat.
ADDITIONAL FEATURES
- Daily Briefing: Powerful marine weather data condensed into a simple text forecast.
- Maps: High resolution forecasts maps with animated streamlines, wind barbs or arrows.
- Tables: The ultimate dashboard for detailed analysis of Wind, Wave, Rain and more.

- Local Knowledge: Hear about the best marine spots, amenities and activities at your destination.
- Weather Alerts: Set your preferences then get alerts when conditions are just the way you like them for Wind, wave and other parameters.
- Ocean Data: See what’s happening under the waves with ocean and tidal currents, and sea temperature.
- GPS Tracking: Get a free customized GPS tracking page for your blog or website showing wind data overlaid.
- AIS Data: View over 280,000 vessels worldwide on the AIS network to see marine traffic.

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,19,486154808,Weather Underground: Local Map,"Weather Underground, LLC",https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/weather-underground-local-map/id486154808?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Discover a reliable, real-time and hyper-local forecast that will always warn you about upcoming severe weather. Weather Underground combines data from over 250,000+ personal weather stations and a proprietary forecast model to give you the most accurate and hyperlocal forecasts, at a microclimate level. Discover about current conditions, interactive Nexrad radar, get customizable severe weather alerts and much more. You’ll always be prepared for whatever the weather brings.
5 REASONS TO DOWNLOAD WEATHER UNDERGROUND
• Severe weather alerts: set weather alerts for your exact position, so you can always be prepared for an upcoming storm!

• Local conditions: get current weather conditions from local weather stations and hourly/daily summary forecasts up to 10 days in the future, which include chance of precipitation and daily weather summaries.

• Most detailed weather data: stay updated with the best weather data including temperature, “Feels Like,” wind speed, wind directions, today’s rain accumulation, humidity, dew point, visibility, and pressure.
• Other geographical data: discover our air quality index, UV index, local flu outbreaks, sunrise & sunset and moonrise & moonset.
• Customized experience: set your app with light & dark modes, various map types and units.
DISCOVER THE UNIQUE FEATURES OF WEATHER UNDERGROUND
• Interactive radar maps & severe weather:
• The most interactive weather map on mobile allows you to select from different weather overlays, personal weather stations, nexrad radar, satellite, heat maps, and rain accumulation.
• Sophisticated weather visualizations with hi-res satellite & cloud cover imagery from GOES-16, powered by data from NOAA.
• Keep an eye out for extreme weather and always be prepared with severe weather alerts.
Accurate hyper-local forecasts:
• Over 250,000 personal weather stations report the most accurate local weather conditions.

• Made to fill in the gaps between the airport weather stations that other weather services rely upon to generate forecasts - meaning our data is generated from actual data points in your neighborhood.
Subscribe to Premium!
• Upgrade and remove all ads from your weather app by purchasing an annual subscription.
• Access Smart Forecasts: set your ideal weather conditions for your outdoor activities and we’ll tell you when to go.
• View Extended Hourly Forecasts up to 15 days in the future.

You can cancel your Weather Underground subscription anytime through your iTunes account settings, or it will automatically renew. CHANGE THE TIME
In the settings, you can switch between ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time.’ To switch between them, click the ‘Your time’ and ‘Local time’ options on the clock's hour section.
ADD LOCATION ON APPLE WATCH
It’s handy to know that the first location added to your list is set as the location on your Apple Watch. To edit or change this, you can reorder the cities in your location overview on your iPhone.
CHANGE MY BACKGROUND VIDEO
Unfortunately, you can’t manually select a video to play as a background. The app selects a random video from a pool of weather videos that match the weather for the report you’re currently viewing.

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,23,586630051,Meteo - Previsioni by Centro Meteo Italiano,Centro Meteo Italiano Srl,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/meteo-previsioni-by-centro-meteo-italiano/id586630051?uo=4,0.0,0,0,Weather,"Se cerchi un’applicazione Meteo gratuita, bella, rapida, facile da utilizzare, e soprattutto precisa e puntuale nelle previsioni del tempo, la nuova release dell’app “Meteo” del Centro Meteo italiano è l’applicazione che fa parte te !

Completamente rinnovata nel layout grafico e nelle funzionalità l’applicazione è stata progettata per rendere l’esperienza di navigazione dell’utente efficace, efficiente e soddisfacente secondo le tre “regole auree” dell’usabilità.

“Meteo” del Centro Meteo Italiano offre previsioni del tempo ad alta affidabilità, riferite ai comuni, alle località di mare e montagna in Italia e nel Mondo, direttamente sul tuo smartphone o tablet Android, con informazioni fino a 14 giorni e aggiornamenti dati in tempo reale.

Le previsioni giornaliere sono fornite anche con il dettaglio orario, per darti, ora per ora, il massimo delle informazioni, come lo stato del cielo, temperature minime e massime, venti, zero termico, quota neve e le allerte dei principali fenomeni meteorologici.

La funzionalità “Meteo Viaggi"" ti permette di calcolare il percorso per raggiungere una meta conoscendo in anticipo le condizioni meteo durante tutto il tragitto con gli orari dei passaggi. Tale funzione è valida anche per viaggi all'estero!

La funzionalità “Allerta Meteo” è stata completamente ripensata per una migliore fruibilità da parte dell’utente. Grazie al servizio di “allerte meteo” potrai essere comodamente aggiornato, in tempo reale, sulle condizioni meteo riguardanti gli eventi da te inseriti, attraverso la ricezione di notifiche push. Senza necessità di consultare le previsioni, la App di Centro Meteo Italiano ti avviserà in caso di fenomeni meteo interferenti con il tuo ""evento"".
Con la funzione “WebCam” potrai vedere in tempo reale lo stato del cielo dei diversi comuni italiani, consultando migliaia di webcam in continuo aggiornamento.
L'applicazione, infine, è completa di radar, satelliti e mappe previsionali, una finestra sui cambiamenti meteo in nowcasting o per scoprire gli scenari futuri.

“Meteo” del Centro Meteo italiano ti permette inoltre di salvare le tue località preferite e di poterle scorrere comodamente in modalità “swipe”. L’applicazione è dotata inoltre di sistema di georeferenziazione per fornirti in maniera precisa e tempestiva le previsioni del tempo in base alla tua posizione.
Applicazione ufficiale del sito www.centrometeoitaliano.it
LISTA INFORMAZIONI FORNITE:
- Meteo Italia (8500 località+montagna). Esa-orarie. Fino a 15 giorni.
- Meteo Estero (migliaia di città dal mondo). Fino a 7 giorni.
- Meteo Viaggi (il meteo per il tuo viaggio)
- Allerta Meteo (allerta meteo per le tua attività)
- Notizie
- Chat
- WebCam
- Satelliti
- Radar
- Mappe modelli previsionali
- Gestione località preferite (modalità “swipe”)

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,24,980123924,Rain Viewer: Weather Radar Map,MeteoLab Inc.,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/rain-viewer-weather-radar-map/id980123924?uo=4,0.0,5,8,Weather,"Built by a small team, Rain Viewer delivers the most accurate and immediate short-term rain predictions straight from raw radar data. No third-party providers - our independent, professional-grade processing is trusted by millions of users, countless indie developers, and major weather companies. Dive into weather with unmatched detail, real-time data, and a sleek, modern interface designed specifically for weather enthusiasts.
Why Rain Viewer?

• Ultimate Precision & Speed: Maximum resolution radar data at original quality, delivered instantly from weather radars with zero delay. Professional radar products, including reflectivity, velocity, spectrum width, differential reflectivity, differential phase, correlation coefficient, and more, across all available tilts for US and selected European weather radars.

• Professional Experience: 48-hour radar history, 2-hour forecasts (5-minute updates), and long-term models (ICON, ICON-EU, GFS, HRRR, ECMWF) for 72-hour precipitation/temperature data, plus 72-hour hourly forecasts and 14-day daily outlook.
• Independent Data: We process every pixel in-house, pulling raw radar feeds for a completely autonomous weather view.
• Modern UX: Intuitive, clean interface with Metal-powered 60fps vector maps and unique precipitation direction arrows showing real-time storm movement.
• Total Customisation: Fine-tune alerts, thresholds, colour schemes, and multi-location settings to your exact specifications.
Advanced Tools:
• Completely free standalone Apple Watch app with radar, satellite maps, forecasts, severe alerts, and complications - fully functional without an iPhone.
• Free weather radar widgets for home and lock screens with precipitation direction arrows.
• Live Activities with dynamic minute-by-minute rain intensity graphs.
• Severe weather alerts directly from National Weather Services.
• Best-in-class hurricane tracking with timed alerts telling you exactly when the hurricane will be closest to your location.
Your Privacy, Our Promise:
No data collection or sales. Location used solely for forecasts and alerts. Every installation starts fresh - no user history stored.
Join millions who trust Rain Viewer for storm chasing, hiking, or planning outdoor activities. See precipitation with precision and clarity.
PRO Plan: Monthly: £8.99 | Quarterly: £19.99 | Annual: £39.99 (Auto-renewal can be disabled in App Store settings).

cv,Cabo Verde,Weather,6001,25,1542742219,Weather ´,Apptico,https://apps.apple.com/cv/app/weather/id1542742219?uo=4,0.0,4.33333,3,Weather,"Get forecasts up to 16 days ahead, with detailed hour-by-hour data for the next 96 hours. Customize the experience to focus on what matters most to you — from temperature and precipitation to wind, humidity, UV index, and air quality. Explore real-time radar maps to track rain, snow, ice and cyclones in your area. Stay notified about today’s conditions and tomorrow’s outlook.
Whether you’re planning a busy week, heading outdoors, or just wondering if you’ll need a jacket, this app delivers accurate, reliable weather — fast and easy to read.
Optimized for both iPhone and iPad, with adaptive layouts to provide the best experience across all screen sizes.
# Accurate Forecasts

Stay informed with 16-day extended forecasts and 96-hour hourly breakdowns. Access key data like temperature, rain probability, wind speed and direction, cloud cover, humidity, UV index, and more — all in a single view.
# Interactive Radar Maps
Track rain, snow, ice, and cyclones in real time with high-resolution radar. Follow weather patterns around you and anticipate changes before they happen.
# Real-Time Air Quality
Keep an eye on air quality with detailed AQI readings, including PM2.5, PM10, ozone, nitrogen dioxide, carbon monoxide, and sulfur dioxide levels — updated live and presented clearly.
# Customizable Interface
Make the app your own. Choose the metrics you want to display, rearrange forecast blocks, switch between metric and imperial units, and set morning and evening weather reports at your preferred time.
# Notifications
Get timely alerts with daily summaries for the current day and upcoming forecasts — so you’re always a step ahead.
# Multiple Locations
Check the weather in all your favorite places. Your current location updates automatically using GPS, with quick access to saved locations around the world.
# Designed for Clarity
Every detail is organized for ease of use, whether you’re a casual user or a weather power user. A clean, modern interface makes checking the forecast feel effortless.
Some features, including Interactive Radar Maps and Real-Time Air Quality, are available with a paid subscription (3 days free, then $12.99/month or $29.99/year).
